## monospace ls

list known workspaces in this monospace

### Synopsis

It will list workspaces in this monospace.

Example:
```
  monospace ls -l
  monospace ls path/to/a/monospace
```

```
monospace ls [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for ls
  -l, --long   add information about projects repositories
```
